Author: lovelylayout
Text: Re: Master's program, even if it doesn't feel like it now, that opportunity will always be there for you later. This is anecdotal, but my SO took a break from his master's program to focus on his physical and mental wellbeing and now that he's in a better place, he's just started a new and better master's program this semester. I know it probably seems like it's all or nothing but sometimes it's not. <3 I hope things start to look up for you.

Author: LowCalPal
Text: Your mom and your fianc√© love you; you should trust them.    One of the things that the nurse team at treatment orientation that I went to told us was that 90% of people feel ambivalent or negative toward treatment when they start.  Your feelings are normal.
